title: Joined imam in sujood, do I put hands on chest for a second after saying Allahuakbar Assim al hakeem
transcript: asia from saudi arabia um if the imam is in sujud i come late so i stand in the road i say allahu akbar i see people doing this and putting their hands on their chest for a second then say allahu akbar and go for is this from the sun and says no you just say allahu akbar allahu akbar or allah once and go this suffices for the takbir of movement
